overview: Jamie Haenggi was named Chief Marketing Officer in May 2007, and is responsible for overseeing Marketing, Retail Sales and Corporate Communications. Ms. Haenggi joined Vonage in November 2006 as Vice President of Customer Life, leveraging 15 years of experience marketing services for the home to consumers for Vonage. Prior to joining Vonage, Ms. Haenggi served as Vice President of Worldwide Marketing for ADT Security Services. Ms. Haenggiâ€™s vast experience in the home security and protection industry also includes tenure as the head of marketing and acquisition integration at Holmes Protection and as the Director of National Guardianâ€™s International Division. Ms. Haenggi is a graduate of the University of Minnesota with a B.A. in International Relations and Japanese. She lives in Fair Haven, NJ with her husband and two children.
